spatial_accuracy.notes: Major layout mismatch: the 2D plan’s bottom-left zone is Laundry + Closet, but the 3D render places the kitchen cabinetry/appliances there (E2/E5). The kitchen/dining area footprint is expanded/shifted compared to the plan, breaking the intended room zoning (E2). Hall/circulation geometry is altered with extra/angled partitions not present in the plan (E5) and several openings/door locations do not match the plan’s wall breaks (E2/E3). Window distribution on the right/top facades does not follow the plan’s specific placements/counts (E2). Room proportions (notably hall vs. service rooms) appear distorted relative to labeled areas (E4).

structural_fidelity.notes: Adjacency relationships are violated: Laundry should adjoin hall and closet at bottom-left, but that area is used as kitchen (E2), implying Laundry is missing/relocated without plan support (E1). Additional small rooms/closet-like partitions near the entry/hall are introduced (E5). Door embedding/locations are inconsistent with the plan (multiple interior doors appear repositioned) (E2/E3). Wall thickness looks broadly consistent but the internal partitioning does not match the 2D wall layout (E2).

furniture_mapping.notes: Some high-level furniture intent matches (dining table in kitchen/dining zone; living seating cluster; two bedrooms with bed/desk). However, because the kitchen/service-room locations are incorrect, furniture/appliance mapping to the correct rooms is unreliable (E2). Several items appear generic/hallucinated (e.g., oversized wardrobe blocks and living glazing context) and scale feels inconsistent in the tight service-core areas (E5/E4).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean, readable isometric with good lighting and generally tidy geometry. Camera is consistent with an isometric-style view, though not strictly orthographic. Minor visual ambiguity in the service-core (bath/closets) and some window/door modeling looks stylized rather than plan-faithful.

detected_errors.description: Kitchen is placed/expanded into the bottom-left area where the 2D plan shows Laundry + Closet.
Laundry room (as a distinct labeled space with correct location) is missing or not identifiable in the 3D render.
Extra interior partitions/small rooms near the entry/hall appear that are not present in the 2D plan.
Hall and internal wall alignments differ from the 2D plan, changing circulation and room boundaries.
Window placement/count on the right/top exterior walls does not match the specific window locations in the 2D plan.
Several interior doors/openings show different positions and/or swing/orientation compared to the 2D plan.
Room proportion distortion: hall/service-core areas appear oversized/reshaped relative to the plan’s labeled room sizes and outlines.
Large sliding/glazed door elements are introduced on the left side that are not clearly indicated as such in the 2D plan.
